kDesc
She saw three ships come sailing in... And got excited because they were delivering the latest fashions! [#Legal]
Elle a vu trois bateaux en arrivage... et ça l'a excitée car ils amenaient les derniers vêtements à la mode ! [#Legal]
Sie sah drei Schiffe heransegeln... Und sie freute sich, weil sie die neuste Mode an Bord hatten! [#Legal]
Ha visto tre navi entrare in porto... E non sta più nella pelle perché sa che portano gli ultimissimi capi fashion! [#Legal]
Vio cómo se aproximaban tres barcos... ¡Y se emocionó porque traían los modelos de moda! [#Legal]
退屈な制服など着たくないとの要望でデザインされた最新ファッション。[#Legal]
배 세 척이 입항하는 것을 확인한 그녀는 흥분을 감추지 못합니다. 최신 패션을 싣고 오는 것을 알고 있으니까요![#Legal]
She saw three ships come sailing in... And got excited because they were delivering the latest fashions! [#Legal]
她看到三艘船開了過來……。心中無比雀躍，因為是送來當季最新潮的服裝！ [#Legal]
